statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.ChannelID , AA.Position , AA.PersonID
, BB.PersonType , BB.PersonName , BB.EngName , BB.Email , BB.PhoneNo1 , BB.PhoneNo2 , BB.FaxNo , BB.ImageUrl
FROM dbo.BMChannelContact AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo.BMPerson BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.PersonID = BB.ID WHERE AA.ChannelID = #ChannelID# ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.ChannelID , AA.Position , AA.PersonID
FROM dbo.BMChannelContact AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.BMChannelContact ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, ChannelID, Position, PersonID ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #ChannelID#, #Position#, #PersonID# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.BMChannelContact SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName = #UpdateByName#
, Position = #Position# WHERE ID = #ID#
